name: December's Seasonal Truffle: Peppermint
description:
It's that time of year, undeniably so! That's why we figured it was high time to roll out our favorite holiday flavor. For the month of December, our Peppermint Truffle is the perfect little festive treat to share or to keep. The choice is yours! Sold in sets of 3.

Handcrafted and shipped domestically every Tuesday.

All Certified Organic Ingredients || Vegan || No Refined Sugar

name: Winter Truffle: Hazelnut Cardamom Black Currant
description:
We've wrapped up some of our very favorite winter flavors into our newest truffle. Our Hazelnut Cardamom Black Currant Truffle is the perfect little cozy delight to be enjoyed by a roaring fire with your favorite nightcap. The harmonious marriage of these rustic and complex flavors is an epicurean experience not to be missed. Sold in sets of 3.

Handcrafted and shipped domestically every Tuesday.

All Certified Organic Ingredients || Vegan || No Refined Sugar

name: Truffles: Bergamot, Lavender, Classic (3 Pieces)
description:
Our Truffle boasts a few different varieties for both the discerning palette and the simplest sweet tooth. All truffles are rolled in fair trade cacao nibs, unless otherwise noted. Sold in sets of 3.

Handcrafted and shipped domestically every Tuesday.

+ Bergamot: Hints of Italian citrus mingle with our classic dark chocolate. Decadent and refreshing, all year round. 

+ Lavender: Our crowd pleaser. Organic French lavender playfully hidden throughout our classic dark chocolate. This delicate floral has a flavor profile that will surprise you, in a very good way.

+ Classic: Badminton dark chocolate, making a delicious statement all on its own. 

+ The Earl Grey Set: Try all three. Pick a favorite for yourself. 


All Certified Organic Ingredients || Vegan || No Refined Sugar

options.name: The Earl Grey Set: Lavender, Bergamot,   Classic

name: Rustic Almond Buttercup (2 Pieces)
description:
Treat your tastebuds to a buttercup that is a little more refined. The robust flavor of organic roasted California almonds is one that makes for a butter so creamy, it's nearly divine. 

Each one of our delectable chocolate cups is filled with a spoonful of some of our best housemade nut butters. Lovingly topped with Admiralty Salt Co.'s handcrafted sea salt from the Straits of San Juan de Fuca, WA, each is a flavorful experience all it's own. Sold in sets of 2.

Handcrafted and shipped every Tuesday.

All Certified Organic Ingredients || Vegan || No Refined Sugar

name: Sunny Buttercup (2 Pieces)
description:
With a distinct flavor that pairs perfectly with our chocolate, this has been a fan favorite. The rich texture of this cup is the perfect late afternoon delight. 

Each one of our delectable chocolate cups is filled with a spoonful of some of our best housemade nut butters. Lovingly topped with Admiralty Salt Co.'s handcrafted sea salt from the Straits of San Juan de Fuca, WA, each is a flavorful experience all it's own. Sold in sets of 2.

Handcrafted and shipped every Tuesday.

All Certified Organic Ingredients || Vegan || No Refined Sugar

name: Campfire Peanut Buttercup (2 Pieces)
description:
Relive your favorite campouts from the summer with our peanut butter cup, topped with a delicately smoked sea salt. 

Each one of our delectable chocolate cups is filled with a spoonful of some of our best housemade nut butters. Lovingly topped with Admiralty Salt Co.'s handcrafted sea salt from the Straits of San Juan de Fuca, WA, each is a flavorful experience all it's own. Sold in sets of 2.

Handcrafted and shipped every Tuesday.
